text.base: the person can purchase medical marijuana in the state being visited
text.parse: s(ver('12.2.9.975'),v(purchase+can,t(simple,modal,normal)),sb('the person',plural),o('medical marijuana in the state being visited'))

text.base: the person has a prescription for medical marijuana in a state other than the state being visited
text.parse: s(ver('12.2.9.975'),v(have,t(simple,present,normal)),sb('the person',singular),o('a prescription for medical marijuana in a state other than the state being visited'))

text.base: the person can possess medical marijuana in the state being visited
text.parse: s(ver('12.2.9.975'),v(possess+can,t(simple,modal,normal)),sb('the person',plural),o('medical marijuana in the state being visited'))
